content:
@Keith Boone
14838 NPI and DEA numbers field can be introduced.

DEA and NPI identifiers would be communicated in Practitioner.identifiers (and maybe also in PractitionerRole.identifiers). So you can search for these already using the identifier search parameter with the appropriate identifier system.

See:
https://www.hl7.org/fhir/practitioner.html#search
https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#ptypes

I suggest we include this in a block vote to close as non-persuasive.
NPI and DEA are realm-specific identifiers. Do we want to call out realm-specific IDs in the base spec?
we do if they're freqeunt enough FAQ, and then we call them examples
I agree this should be non-pursuasive, and suggest that these are US Realm, potentially US-Core

I agree this should be non-pursuasive, and suggest that these are US Realm, potentially US-Core

...already there...
